page.title: 13NEWPORT COUNTY
page.content:
{Newport County Football Club}is currently in the Third Division of the Football league.
{Somerton Park,}the home of the club was once used by a Speedway Team and the track is still running around the perimeter of the ground.
Due to the clubs financial troubles the ground has fallen into decay over the last few seasons, and last year the club was threatened with bankruptcy.
Now however the club's future is more promising and we are hopeful that the 1985/86 season will be very successful.
